# HMError.Code.writeOnlyCharacteristic

**Case**

An attempt to read from a write-only characteristic.

## Declaration

```swift
case writeOnlyCharacteristic
```

## Characteristic errors

- **HMError.Code.readOnlyCharacteristic**: An attempt to modify a read-only value.

items.description: An attempt to modify a read-only value.
